description: Sekine plays a G&L L-2000 bass guitar in http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster]. She likes to play pranks on those around her to see the surprised faces of her victims. She also likes to abruptly improvise during performances, which makes http://anidb.net/ch15350 [Hisako] get mad at her. Her full name is Sekine Shiori.
name: Sekine Shiori
